func.name: cpp_binop
func.header: void cpp_binop_$T(Ref res, OpCode code, Flag flag, Ref arg1, $T op1, Ref arg2, $T op2)
func.body: Binop <$T>(res, code, flag, arg1, op1, arg2, op2);

func.name: cpp_icmp
func.header: void cpp_icmp_$T(Ref res, Cond cond, Ref op1, $T v1, Ref op2, $T v2)
func.body: ICmp <$T>(res, cond, op1, v1, op2, v2);
